text: UAll√¢h nguYe Odale amazulu nomhlaba nothumela amanzi (emhlabeni) evela esibhakabhakeni Aze ngawo lawo Avelise iziqhamo ukuba zibe yimbonelelo yenu, Wenza iinqanawa kananjalo ukuba zibe luncedo kuni; ngokuthi ziwize (zidade) zinqumle ulwandle ngoMyalelo waKhe, Wenza nemilambo ukuba ibe luncedo kuni
